DOC.brief_summary: Patients suffering from congenital fourth cranial nerve palsy may have misalignment of jaws as well as teeth due to head tilt in childhood.
DOC.brief_title: Teeth and Jaw Misalignment in Patients Suffering From Congenital Fourth Cranial Nerve Palsy
DOC.detailed_description: Measurement of teeth and jaw parameters in patients suffering from congenital fourth cranial nerve palsy compared to patients without fourth cranial nerve palsy.
DOC.criteria: unilateral congenital fourth nerve palsy natural teeth occlusion age > 18 years bilateral fourth nerve palsy no natural teeth occlusion
